description:
Unassuming, yet it packs a punch!! This green tea bath smells so great you'll start feeling the effects as soon as you open the jar. Ease yourself into the water and allow this special blend of herbs, salts, and oils to soothe your worries and purge any remaining stress. This bath will leave you feeling at peace and with a fresh dose of energy!

Every ingredient was thoroughly researched and chosen specifically to bring certain qualities to this bath. Once purchased you will receive a full ingredient list. If you have any allergy concerns please message me, and I will be more than happy to discuss what I use to figure out something that works for you!
